name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical drink with rum and orgeat syrup.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A sweet and tart cocktail with cranberry juice.

name: Margarita
description: A tangy cocktail with lime and orange liqueur.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A classic cocktail with lemon juice and whiskey.

name: Negroni
description: A bitter cocktail with gin, Campari, and vermouth.

name: Boulevardier
description: A whiskey-based cocktail with Campari and vermouth.

name: Old Fashioned
description: A classic cocktail with whiskey, bitters, sugar, and a twist of citrus.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail with rum, mint, lime, and soda water.

name: Martini
description: A classic cocktail with gin and vermouth, often garnished with an olive.

name: Manhattan
description: A sophisticated cocktail with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters.

name: Daiquiri
description: A simple and classic cocktail with rum, lime juice, and sugar.

name: Pina Colada
description: A creamy tropical cocktail with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.

name: Sazerac
description: A classic New Orleans cocktail with rye whiskey, absinthe, and bitters.

name: Tom Collins
description: A refreshing cocktail with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and soda water.

name: Gimlet
description: A simple cocktail with gin and lime juice, often sweetened with a touch of sugar.

name: Vesper Martini
description: A strong martini made with gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc.

name: Aviation
description: A classic cocktail with gin, maraschino liqueur, and lemon juice.

name: Bloody Mary
description: A savory cocktail with vodka, tomato juice, and various spices.

name: Espresso Martini
description: A coffee-flavored cocktail with vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur.
